articles.author: Cameron Faulkner
articles.title: Should you buy a Switch or wait for Switch 2? - Polygon
articles.description: Rumors suggest that Nintendo may debut the Switch 2 in 2024. With that in mind, is it still worth it to buy the current-generation Switch?
articles.content: Even in its swan-song era, the Nintendo Switch continues to find new players. It recently became the third-best-selling console of all time, and players such as my kindergarten-aged nephew are repres… [+5090 chars]
